dmca.title: Video Production Product Key Posted on Google Groups (#2)
dmca.body:
13 Dec 2002 10:39    muvee Technologies Pte Lt  +[private]  P.1
    


		muvee Technologies Pte. Ltd.
		[private]
		Singapore 189646

		tel.: [private]
		fax: [private]
    
		muvee
		Technologies	www.muvee.conn
                                world's only smart automatic video editing

		13th December 2002

		Fax to: [private] (page 1 of 2)

		Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints, Google

		Dear Sir or Madam

		Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement - Reference Google Case ID: #[private]

		1. We sell the product key of our software 'muvee autoProducer 2.1' on our website for
		US$49.95 which enables the customer to use the full version of our software. One such
		product key has been published on Google groups, which people are using extensively
		to get the full version of the software for free. muvee Technologies Pte. Ltd. is the
		developer of this software and has the exclusive right to license it via Electronic
		Software download from our website at www.muvee.com.

		The product key appearing on Google groups is:

		[private]

		2. The copyright material in (1) appears at

		Search Query:			muvee
		Infringing Web Pages:		groups.google.com/
		URL of the pages:
    
		http://groups.google.com.sg/groups?q=muvee&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-
		8&newwingow=1&selm=aoukrn%24mms%241%40news-reader11.wanadoo.fr&rnum=7		

		(Message 2)
		http://groups.google.com.sg/groups?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-
		8&newwindow=1&threadm=aoukrn%24mms%241%40news-
		reader11.wanadoo.fr&rnum=7&prev=/groups%3Fq%3Dmuvee%26hl%3Den%26lr%3D
		%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DUTF-
		8%26newwindow%3D1%26selm%3Daoukrn%2524mms%25241%2540news-
		reader11.wanadoo.fr%26rnum%3D7

    
						1

    




    13 Dec 2002 10:39    muvee Technologies Pte Lt +[private]           p.2



		muvee Technologies Pte. Ltd.

		4. The newsgroup on which the infringing entry has appeared:
		alt.2600.cracks

		5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on
		the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent,
		or the law.

		6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate
		and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
		exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.



		Yours truly,
